artist: Artist: Arthur Rackham; Publisher: Constable & Co., Ltd. London; Printer: T. & A. Constable, Edinburgh University Press
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
description: binding: Full green fabric; gold-stamped lettering and designs; endpapers: white wove with printed designs in violet ink; 262 pp. (excluding illustrations)
medium: Reproductions of pen and ink drawings
title: Little Brother and Little Sister and Other Tales by the Brothers Grimm
